title: So I got my boyfriend into league like a week ago
body: and he's an artist, so naturally he made his first skin concept for his favorite character. He was too shy to share it, but I think it's pretty good and comical.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=UVM ZhaoRiTian,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-02T19:18:27.825+0000)
>
> _<Removed>_

I'm a guy lol
omegalul
League is a game for women* (not womAN), men, gay, straight, black, white etc. It is a game for all to play. Get out of here with your sexism.
big gay.

> [{quoted}](name=Helen w 3 kids,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-02T19:21:16.813+0000)
>
> I'm a guy lol

rofl
what's the story behind your name then?

> [{quoted}](name=Myrmiron,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=00010000000d,timestamp=2018-12-03T07:40:44.007+0000)
>
> rofl
> what's the story behind your name then?

My friends and I really like to meme on middle aged moms and how passive-aggresively savage they are. I work in retail too, so very stereotypical "I want to speak to your manager" ladies hits home. Anywho, I just like to say "I want to see your manager" in all chat everytime I get a multi kill

> [{quoted}](name=Helen w 3 kids,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=00010000000d0001,timestamp=2018-12-03T07:45:43.487+0000)
>
> My friends and I really like to meme on middle aged moms and how passive-aggresively savage they are. I work in retail too, so very stereotypical "I want to speak to your manager" ladies hits home. Anywho, I just like to say "I want to see your manager" in all chat everytime I get a multi kill

That's hilarious.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Myrmiron,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=00010000000d,timestamp=2018-12-03T07:40:44.007+0000)
>
> rofl
> what's the story behind your name then?

Because why not? He doesn't need to have a guys name just because he's a guy. :p

> [{quoted}](name=Ranmaru Kurosaki,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=00010000000d0000,timestamp=2018-12-03T07:43:25.423+0000)
>
> Because why not? He doesn't need to have a guys name just because he's a guy. :p

I mean it's a very unusual name, I know quite a few guys that have names that describe their life situation (1 of my friends is literally called "*his first name* from *where he lives*"), and obviously his name isn't Helen so there must be a story behind it I guess.

> [{quoted}](name=Helen w 3 kids,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-02T19:21:16.813+0000)
>
> I'm a guy lol

Yikes. Wouldn't surprise me if that guy remembers this as one of those embarrassing moments that always keep haunting you many years after it happened.

Your boyfriend draws really well.
Really?  I play with a few girls.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=00010000000300000000,timestamp=2018-12-02T23:16:03.263+0000)
>
> I am not saying that there are 0 girls who play league. I am saying that there is a low percentage of league of legends players who are female. There are a low number of "female gamers" overall.

I've ran into a few girls. My best friend is a girl who plays league, actually.
I honestly know just as many female league players as i do male, personally anyways, on the boards its much more guy.

> [{quoted}](name=UVM ZhaoRiTian,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-02T19:18:27.825+0000)

bold of you to assume that the op is a woman

What makes you think that women can't play league
everyone can play league. not just guys
why is it bold to assume hes a girl lol, its actually pretty natural to assume such a thing.
https://thumbs.gfycat.com/GreedyDefiniteArawana-small.gif his E
His art style is really clean honestly. Encourage him to be more confident in his work because this is great!
When he E’s someone a coin should pop off their head with a “ding!” Sound.
Are you a boy or a girl?

> [{quoted}](name=Monstermushmush,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-12-02T23:04:40.235+0000)
>

professor oak, is that you?
plz have him draw thresh as Luigi!

I just wanted to thank everyone for their kind words. 💕💕 I've passed on your regards to the artist, and you guys made him happy. I definitely wasnt expecting all this positive feedback when I posted it, but I am so grateful.

> [{quoted}](name=Helen w 3 kids,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2018-12-03T08:05:42.631+0000)
>
> I just wanted to thank everyone for their kind words. 💕💕 I've passed on your regards to the artist, and you guys made him happy. I definitely wasnt expecting all this positive feedback when I posted it, but I am so grateful.

its a good concept with great art, im glad it made him happy
Wow this is just a friendly thread of someone sharing their bf's drawing and some sexist and homophobic people have to come in and spill some hateful words.
Welcome to League. Enjoy your stay.
That's pfp-worthy lmao
itsa me blitzcrankrio !
i thought the first line will be "and he broke up with me thanks to the game ;("
I really love it! It has that comical design like a comic book.  Title this skin Definitely not ~~Mario~~ Blitzcrank
Thats absolutely awesome !
that's nice
You must save him before it’s too late. The game will consume him into a void of salt and rage. You must move quickly before it’s to late to save him. Go now. Neat robo though.
That was good. They shoulda actually make it

> [{quoted}](name=Fancy      OrNot,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2018-12-03T06:32:49.950+0000)

Nintendo would sue the crap out of Riot.
Lol they can sell it to riot. I woulda buy it even tho  I didn't really play blitz
It's Nintendo, they hang onto their IP harder than Marshawn Lynch grabs his dick when he scores a touchdown.  No way. lol
lol
what a mistake that was getting him into league. i guess u dont care about riots sexism scandal

> [{quoted}](name=IS2cc045cb42356,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2018-12-03T07:59:39.188+0000)
>
> what a mistake that was getting him into league. i guess u dont care about riots sexism scandal

Oh? Do enlighten me. I haven't had such things brought up to me.

> [{quoted}](name=Helen w 3 kids,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ePGENAA1,comment-id=001a0000,timestamp=2018-12-03T08:01:56.865+0000)
>
> Oh? Do enlighten me. I haven't had such things brought up to me.

Early november a bunch of current and formed employees sued Riot for gender discrimination.
No one knows how credible it really is, especially since a few female employees already spoke out in defense of Riot.
Among the charges were serious shit like 1 alleged rape, but also retarded shit like employees saying "dick" too often and "mansplaining".
He's a really good artist.  {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Copyright infringementismo.

I love it.

He should totally have yoshi in the hook hand.

Here we go!
*Misses every hook*
Ya hoo!
"Ya-hoo!"
